title: Pred da se razdeni
text: "Pred da se razdeni" ("Before the sunrise"; with the English version being "If I Could Change The World") is a song recorded by <a href="Macedonians%20%28ethnic%20group%29">Macedonian</a>-<a href="Romani%20people">Romani</a> singer <a href="Esma%20Red%C5%BEepova">Esma Redžepova</a> and <a href="Macedonians%20%28ethnic%20group%29">Macedonian</a> singer <a href="Vlatko%20Lozanoski">Vlatko Lozanoski</a>. The song was written by <a href="Darko%20Dimitrov">Darko Dimitrov</a>, Lazar Cvetkoski, Simeon Atanasov and Magdalena Cvetkoska. It is best known as <a href="Macedonia%20in%20the%20Eurovision%20Song%20Contest%202013">Macedonia's entry</a> to the <a href="Eurovision%20Song%20Contest%202013">Eurovision Song Contest 2013</a> to be held in <a href="Malm%C3%B6">Malmö</a>, <a href="Sweden">Sweden</a>. The song competed in the second semi-final of the competition on 16 May 2013 and failed to qualify to the final, placing 16th and scoring 28 points.
